entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
